item.title: Blueprint Listening Post – Wed 15 Oct, 11:00–11:30
item.description: Drop-in Q&A at Level 3 Breakout Space. Ask your Blueprint questions and hear from the project leads.

item.title: West Gate Bridge Memorial – Wed 15 Oct
item.description: Executive attending 55th Annual West Gate Bridge Memorial at Douglas Parade, Spotswood, honouring 35 workers lost in 1970.

item.title: Table Tennis Tournament – Wed 15 Oct, 12:30
item.description: Final round this Wednesday at 12:30pm. Be there to cheer them on and see who wins!

item.title: FY25 Tax Returns Due – Thu 31 Oct
item.description: Reminder: submit your own tax return for FY25 by 31 Oct if you’re lodging directly with the ATO.

item.title: New Starters – Mon 13 Oct
item.description: Welcome to Senan O’Muirí, Christina Walls and Cath Hinton joining LeavePlus this week.

item.title: Farewells – Oct departures
item.description: Farewell to Danny D’Alessandro and Aneta Nikoloski, finishing on 17 Oct and 31 Oct respectively. Thank you both!

item.title: Match Schedule & Results – Week 3
item.description: Round 3 winners: Shantiks VS EO, KAOS VS Serve & Destroy. Finals next Wednesday!

item.title: Security Pass Reminder
item.description: Keep your security pass safe and return any borrowed passes. Report lost passes immediately to Sharon D.

item.title: Wellness Corner – Weekly Tip
item.description: Give yourself permission to rest. Even 10 minutes with eyes closed helps your body and mind reset.

item.title: Recruiting Now – Internal Roles
item.description: Open roles: Member Response (G3), Resource Analyst (G4), Lawyer (G5), Service Investigations (G2), Business Reading Lead (G4).
